front.title: IEEE Corrigenda to Standard for Information Technology

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Withdrawn September 2008. This corrigendum to Local and Metropolitan Area Network standards, IEEE Std 802.5, 1998 Edition and IEEE Stds 802.5r and 802.5j, 1998 Edition, is part of a family of local area net-work (LAN) standards dealing with the physical and data link layers as defined by the ISO/IEC Open Systems Interconnection Basic Reference Model. Errors that have been identified in the two standards are corrected.
